fall_26.000: I'm helping prepare for tomorrow's festivities.$9
fall_26.003: There is much yet to be done to connect this plane to the other.$1
fall_26.004: %The Wizard is too deep in concentration to take notice of you.
fall_26.006: This task taxes me. I will need to rest soon.$10
winter.000: Sleep calls and yet refuses to take me.$10
spring.000: Even I need fresh air sometimes.$1
marriage_Thu.000: My heart.$1#$b#My tower seems empty compared to our home.$1#$b#But I cannot deny the benefits of working here, at times.$3
marriage_Thu.001: Ah, @. Have you come to check on me?$1#$b#I'll be home, soon. Just after I finish one... last... thing...$3#$b#...$3#$b#What time is it?$10#$b#...I may have forgotten to eat lunch.$11
